about_the_game:
Welcome to Poker Master! Global players compete on the same stage. World famous social games.

DICORD:https://discord.gg/jJQF2GPpD2

New gameplay! Teen Patti is online now!

Play free online Texas Hold'em Poker games with friends and family! Challenge yourself and play against global poker stars playing Texas Hold’em Poker.

• Teen Patti - Each person has 3 cards, a game of psychology and luck, the winner takes all.
• Social Friends - You become friends with your favorite players, send gifts to each other, and invite friends to play together.
• Private room – Higher stakes tables, more brutal and realistic poker games. VIP boxes allow you and your friends to enjoy party poker even more and replay poker games.
• Blackjack - 3 decks of cards, fair and notarized card dealing, 3D card tables and special effects, rewards up to one billion. Come and join the game!
• Game Modes - Texas Hold'em Poker and Short Deck, online and offline.
• Free chips - You don't need spend real money in the game, every day get billions chips for free! Contact customer service, you will get your exclusive secret benefits.
• Mini games – Texas Lottery & slots all in one game, You get one free spin every day! Get the big heat live win of it!
• Scratch - Scratch the card 7 times a week, get the mega hit reward on Sunday. The highest reward is millions free chips!
• Face - New avatars have been updated, you can choose one to be your poker face.
• Quests - Complete daily quests to get free chips and the other Texas benefits!
• Fair - Random Number Generator make the game cards fair game, you can win all by your skill.
• Club - Create a poker club, invite your gamer friends join in it, you can find gamers who is the best of you.
• Quick start - Login in as guest, spend free chips to buy-in. Hold your cash in your own pocket. Show your hand, No one can stop you from having fun! Wish the full house and straight always with you.
• Global - Global players all in one server, you can play with different players live. Get the fun plus.
• Same server -Whether you are Android or iOS, WeChat login or Facebook login, all gamers can play at the same table.
• Monopoly - Brand new monopoly gameplay, while you dominate the casino games, buy real estate, build a business district, and become a real estate tycoon. There are also Monopoly poker cards to collect.
• Slots - A brand new slots game with a huge prize Jackpot waiting for you to win. You are not just a pokerist, you are also a lucky player.
• Easy poker - Clear interface, intuitive operation, and thoughtful voice prompts make it easy for you to learn beginner poker and win the high stakes. Finally became a mega hit poker fighter.
• MTT – Poker tournament is coming, Who will be the next Ultimate Poker World Winner of the poker championship, we will be looking forward to it.
• Poker Live – The live the game has been launched, search for Poker Master Live on YouTube and Twitch.

POKER MASTER puts you in a Vegas casino world, replay your gaming passion, and doubles hit with sexy dealers.
No matter wpt or wsop. Show us who is the poker king of Texas Hold'em Poker hub.

Hereby declare: This game only provides online leisure entertainment; it’s not a gambling games, you cannot exchange any cash or real display goods coin in the game.

If you have any gameplay you want to play, you can tell us in the form of comments, such as Jenga, Bingo, bezique, solitaire blitz, after evaluation. Include all the table games that players like, please look forward to our next plus editions.

Funnier game come soon. Like blackjack, rummy, spades royale, truco, video poker, solitaire poker, pineapple poker, paigow poker, teen patti, craps, shuffle, backgammon,roulette and Omaha in Poker Master.

Now we have hd poker app version on steam, you can play with gaming friends or poker bros.

name: Poker Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64-bit system
  • Processor: Intel G640
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8500 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64-bit system
  • Processor: Intel core i3 2130 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 280
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Free chips!Including Texas Hold'em, Slots, Blackjack,Teen Patti and more poker games.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Indonesian, French, Italian, German, Turkish, Norwegian, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Romanian, Dutch, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
